Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 16 Micchattaniyatattika » 16.5 Saṃsaṭṭhavāra » 16.5.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 16.5.2.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Naāsevanādi
Micchattaniyatattika
Saṃsaṭṭhavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Naāsevanādi
32.
2332Aniyataṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho aniyato dhammo uppajjati naāsevanapaccayā—  aniyataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe…pe…  paṭisandhikkhaṇe…pe… . (1)
2333Micchattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho micchattaniyato dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayā, navipākapaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
2334Aniyataṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho aniyato dhammo uppajjati najhānapaccayā—  pañcaviññāṇaṃ…pe…  namaggapaccayā—  ahetukaṃ aniyataṃ…pe… .
2335Sammattaniyataṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho sammattaniyato dhammo uppajjati navippayuttapaccayā—  arūpe sammattaniyataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe…pe… . (1)
2336Aniyataṃ dhammaṃ saṃsaṭṭho aniyato dhammo uppajjati navippayuttapaccayā—  arūpe aniyataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ saṃsaṭṭhā tayo khandhā…pe…  dve khandhe…pe… . (1)
